Aug. 7, 1899 D Peterborough Contest
Peterborough Contest 0 Other
peterborough-contest
None
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Peterborough, Cambridgeshire 1st prize £20. 2nd prize £14. 3rd prize £8. 4th prize £4. March contest 1st (£1) Batley Old (Le Grande), 2nd (10s.) Kettering Rifles (La Rominaro). 5 bands competed. Contest Field September 1899
April 18, 2012, 1:28 p.m. July 10, 2017, 9:24 a.m.
1 Batley Old Tom Stubley Die Walküre
2 Rotherham Borough Fenton Renshaw Rossini's Works / Rossini Fantasia / Reminiscences of Rossini [arr. Owen]
3 Kettering Rifles Thomas Seddon Rossini's Works / Rossini Fantasia / Reminiscences of Rossini [arr. Owen]
4 Chapeltown Silver Prize Band Samuel Radcliffe Heroic
5 Irthlingborough Town Jeremiah Holdsworth Halevy [arr. Round]
